Wait Time at Walt Disney World Chapter 1 Introduction

Wait Time at Walt Disney World Mildred Ouyang, Xiaoyang Song, Alan Zhu* (Group 12) 2022-10-27 Chapter 1 Introduction Disneyland is one of the most popular parks in the world. However, visitors often spend a long time waiting for facilities. They may wait for hours for a five-minute roller coaster. Thus, we want to find a way to spend less time waiting and enjoy as many facilities as possible. In this project, we will examine the data of Disneyland waiting times, find the pattern, and provide an optimal visit plan.
Chapter 2 Proposal 2.1 Research topic 2.2 Data availability

Chapter 2 Proposal 2.1 Research topic In this project, we focus on the waiting time at Magic Kingdom. We will try to find the pattern for every year, such as a possible peak appearing every summer. We will also create a heat map showing the number of people waiting in lines in Disneyland and how it changes throughout the day. Besides, the correlation between different factors will also be reported. 2.2 Data availability The data comes from THRILL-DATA. The data includes the most recent daily or hourly average waiting time for every facility in the area for decades.
Chapter 3 Data 3.1 Sources 3.2 Cleaning / transformation 3.3 Missing value analysis
